description.en: DiarrheaCoin is a 100% community driven and community oriented cryptocurrency that drives it’s organic growth and enjoyment through Memes relatable to the every day human experience of defecation. The coin is a reflection token that has a per transaction tax of 8% with an auto LP of 4%, 3% rewards to holders and a 1% that goes toward the Marketing wallet along side the charity and use case for future endeavors. This coin embodies everything about irony and Meme culture which is its main driving force in allowing for proper, steady and long-term growth.
